text: Excellent pizza. This place has been open since I was a kid, but I'm sad to say that we found out tonight that they no longer offer table service and will be relocating around February 2018 to a Pizza Hut Express on the other side of Canton Mill Lofts. I wish they would change their minds!

text: Great store. I love pizza hut. So glad the new GM sign was up. I gave it another try tonight and couldn't be more impressed. Finally has managers who actually care. Huge turn around.

name: H C
text: Service was slow, but it was a Saturday evening. Food was excellent. Not many sit down Pizza Huts anymore, so it was fun to take my kid to a restaurant I frequently visited as a child :)

name: Leora Levey
text: They used to not be very good and had terrible service, but I‚Äôve now been here 4 or 5 times this year and they‚Äôve been excellent every time. The food had drastically improved from before and their wings have been perfect every time.

text: First of all think was over charged! Then was outta forks cause they said they weren't washed and dirty . Cheese sauce cold asked to warm up still cold had paper plates?? text: Ordered a pizza a few weeks ago and the sauce was non existant... told me would have a 17 dollar credit and when we called back today we were told that we only had a 15 dollar credit and we still had to pay even though they made the mistake.
